channel.title: About my Port Forwarder/No-IP. Please help me!
channel.description:
Hello, thank you for trying to help me by viewing this topic! :)
In my country, It's all impossible to order by internet. Because my VISA not acceptable for other country. :( Is there any way to make my private server with Portforward.com and NO-IP? I don't have a router, my dad don't know what the router, my mom either. Can you tell me more? Or it's possible to make private server by not paying ANYTHING online? If not, can you just tell me real meaning the router. Which my dad can understand (my dad/mom's only skill by using internet, or just like.. basic skill on computer).
Thank you! ~Cheesy[br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2007, 10:13:45 AM[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.title: About my Port Forwarder/No-IP. Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

download no-ip. (ITS FREE) create a host, run no-ip then run your server and put it online.

You can host without router (makes it easier) because no port forwarding involved!

Read full topic
